example_modid.msg: Custom msg on crash for this mod id. You can use $JAR_NAME$ placeholder, which will be replaced with jar name. You can use HTML here, it will work.

essential-container.msg: The Essential mod($JAR_NAME$) is completely incompatible with all of our modpacks, and there's no reason to use it. All of our modpacks already come with built-in, free world hosting, by clicking the Share World button in the Open to LAN menu.
